parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front fork shock seal can cause oil to leak out, covering the front brakes and tires, leading to a loss of traction and reduced braking ability, which can result in accidents or near-miss incidents.
symptoms: Oil leaking from the front fork shock
oil covering the front brakes and tires
reduced braking ability
loss of traction
motorcycle slipping or falling over
increased stopping distance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The malfunction of the anti-dive system can cause the front fork shock to lock up, leading to over-pressurization and failure of the shock seal, resulting in oil leaks and reduced braking ability.
symptoms: Front fork shock seal failure
oil leaking from the front fork shock
oil covering the front brakes and tires
reduced braking ability
loss of traction
motorcycle slipping or falling over
increased stopping distance.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The reduction of the rear suspension adjustment range can affect the motorcycle's handling and stability, potentially leading to accidents or loss of control.
symptoms: Reduced rear suspension adjustment range
loss of over 25% of suspension adjustment range.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The faulty speedometer can cause the rider to lose focus on the road while trying to adjust the speedometer, potentially leading to accidents.
symptoms: The speedometer would not increase beyond 40 mph until the screen is touched
requiring the rider to use one hand to adjust the speedometer.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The engine surging can cause a sudden loss of engine RPM, leading to a dangerous situation, especially when riding with a passenger.
symptoms: The engine oscillates between 1000 and 1500 RPM when the throttle is held at 1400-1500 RPM
causing a sudden loss of engine RPM and then a surge back.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The recall repair issues can cause problems with the vehicle's performance and safety, potentially leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The vehicle ran fine prior to the recall repairs
but experienced problems after the repairs were performed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The cracking of the frame on the Honda GL1800A can compromise the structural integrity of the motorcycle, leading to a loss of control and increasing the risk of accidents.
symptoms: Cracks in the sub-frame
specifically in the triangle portion at the rear half of the frame
originating from weld areas and migrating into the frame tubing.
